hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1630 a.n today's date is August
5th 2018 and the thought of the episode
is everything that is happening now is
to prepare for the economic transition
now before I get started I just want to
make an announcement I uploaded a new
interview it's with jim willie it is on
the x-22 reports spotlight YouTube
channel so all you need to do is go over
to YouTube type in X for each report
spotlight will bring you to the
interview or you can come over to the
x-22 report calm or new sentinel comm
site scroll down a little bit look over
your right hand side you can play the
interview right on the site or you can
go to steam it that is steam it calm /at
x-22 report and you can play the
interview right on steam it let's get
into the economic collapse financial
news now we're really starting to see
the breakdown of the global economy and
you can change statistical numbers any
way you want you can make it look
fantastic but the bottom line is when
the people are actually feeling it when
you see retail businesses going out of
business when you see corporations going
out of business this tells you the
entire story I mean look prior to 2008
they were telling us whether other
statistical information and all their
research in the Fed looking ahead that
there was nothing wrong everything was
absolutely fantastic everything was
contained there was nothing to worry
about don't worry keep purchasing homes
prices of real estate does not drop it
doesn't so just believe us and they were
completely wrong what we're seeing right
now is a complete and utter breakdown of
the real system I'm not talking about
the illusionary numbers of GDP the
statistical information of unemployment
you can change the numbers you can leave
certain things off you can remove
certain information you can make it look
any way you want the bottom line is when
you really look at what's going on you
can see what's really happening I mean
let's look out in the UK right now the
UK there's a huge housing real estate
downturn right now the same thing that
we're seeing in Australia in Canada the
u.s. of course everyone's making it seem
like everything's fantastic but when you
look at this you can see that there were
major major
problems now out in the UK we have this
company called countrywide this is UK's
largest real estate service group with
over 10,000 employees in 900 locations
and they're seeing their shares drop by
like something like 60% what's the
problem the problem is they're having
problems selling homes people aren't
coming to purchase traffic is drawing up
and it's getting worse as time goes on
and countrywide said it's problem had
been exacerbated by a flagging housing
market particularly in London the prime
central London housing market continues
to experience low levels of activity
owing to political and economic
uncertainty now of course they're using
the brexit to explain away what is
happening here but we see this happening
in Canada we see it happening in
Australia we're seeing it happen in the
US this has nothing to do with brexit
what is happening here is that people
the everyday person who has a job cannot
go out and afford anything anymore
they can't take on a new loan it's
completely impossible and it is
spreading we're seeing in Australia
we're seeing it in Canada we're seeing
it throughout Europe the UK the United
States it's all starting to fall apart
now here in the United States we had the
GDP numbers come out and there's a
reason why we're seeing all this this is
to control the narrative to control what
is coming up and all this is being
prepared for the economic transition
remember who put this system into place
it was the central bank system who
started manipulating the data the deep
state the central bank this is just a
continuation of what they've been doing
why why all of a sudden have they taking
this to the extreme do you really think
GDP miraculously went up to 4% overnight
no it's impossible they they manipulate
the data on purpose now they change the
calculation of real GDP from using 2000
nine dollars to twenty twelve dollars
which boosted growth strictly from a
lower rate of inflation now remember the
Fed is out there and the mainstream
media is out there the corporate media
they're trying to convince everyone that
inflation is like you know 1% one point
two percent one point five percent we
want to get it up to two percent but if
you go out and you ask the average
household about real inflation and you
talk about health care costs insurance
food energy do you really think they're
gonna say yeah it's about one percent no
they are likely to give you an earful
that the cost of living is substantially
higher than one point two percent but if
you look if you look at what the Fed has
been doing they've been telling you that
we don't see inflation and we know that
this is completely fake phony and false
now this revision which was almost
entirely due to the change in the
inflation rate on a nominal basis there
was virtually no real change at all in
other words stronger economic growth
came from a mathematical adjustment
rather than the increases in actual
economic activity the change to a lower
inflation rate also boosted disposable
incomes and personal consumption
expenditures which also boosted the
savings rate but that changed that
calculation that they changed it doesn't
change an economic reality yes on paper
it looks great but in reality that's
something completely different
despite the adjusted bump in savings
consumer activity continues to remain
weak given that roughly seventy percent
of the economic calculation comes from
personal consumption so if we watch
consumer activity which is a good
leading indicator of where the economy
is headed next we can see that consumers
are not very active why do you think
retail is plummeting why do you think
people are not purchasing homes
why do you think automobile sales are
dropping because the plan was to get
everyone in subprime sub subprime anyone
that has a heartbeat they're running out
people that's the problem
so changing the math doesn't change
reality and if you look on the street
and you talk to the everyday person you
can see that reality does not match the
statistical information that they
changed but this is all being done on
purpose
because what they're doing is they're
pushing the economy to the edge to
control the narrative because they're
gonna go back and say hey wait a minute
who's been doing this who's in charge of
this we're we getting these numbers
you've been telling me all along
that the economy's doing fantastically
we're these the same calculations that
Obama was using I mean the Fed doesn't
know that these are fake numbers what's
going on here that's what's going to
happen now remember under Obama and many
other presidents they were putting a lot
of people on food stamps getting a lot
of people on to entitlement programs and
they were making everyone dependent on
the government and once you have
everyone dependent on the government
you can control people now remember what
they wanted to do is they wanted to
place everyone on the government
entitlement programs also give them
universal basic income just continually
create currency create currency even if
the economy collapses they would put the
printing presses into double overdrive
and people still get their entitlements
now when the economy collapses we're not
doing that and if you had people on all
these entitlement programs like food
stamps and things like that and people
weren't receiving it you might have
riots you might have people very upset
so before the transition occurs you need
to get everyone off of the government
assistant programs yes there's still
going to be people on there but you
don't want to have the majority of the
American people on it because they'll
rise up and they'll be very pissed
when their payments stopped so right now
the Trump administration the Patriots
they're removing people from the food
stamps about 3.5 million people have
been lifted off food stamps right now so
when the system falls apart they don't
have to look at the government and say
hey how come we're not getting our money
we're getting very angry I can't eat
right now people are going to figure out
a way to get their food maybe get a
part-time job or at some other way and
many people they were receiving this
money where they really didn't need it
and they were just on it and all of this
is being done for a particular reason
now again I'm not saying that everyone
was on there that didn't there's gonna
be certain people that really do need it
but to have three and a half million
people on there it wasn't going to work
as we go through this transition because
guess what the government cannot pay for
all this this is not what the Founding
Fathers really wanted and the only way
to get off of this and I know it's gonna
be difficult for many people and it's
going to be difficult as we go through
this transition nobody said this was
going to be easy nobody said there was
going to be a light switch what you just
flipped up and everything was gonna be
back to normal if you want a system that
is a people driven system where you're
creating currency without interest
attached you need to separate it from
the system we're in now and the only way
to do that is to collapse the system
we're in now and move to something
completely different and yes there's
going to be pain of course there is but
on the other side there's light and we
just have to get there because the
central bankers the deep state they've
done so much damage to the country the
only way out of this is to get rid of
their system because we're under the
influence of their system and we need a
system that is completely different than
what we're in and once we're in a new
system where we're not letting the
government borrow the currency and have
to pay it back with interest which
really translate to the people paying it
back we're gonna see something a lot
better we're gonna see something where
the currency doesn't devalue we're
see something much more stable where a
lot more people can make it but to get
there we're going to have to go through
some pain and the pain has already
started many people are already feeling
it but from this point on it's going to
get worse as we move forward so get
prepared get ready
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
be prepared thanks a lot
